success: I did it what you have asked. As you asked. Like a true friend.
I hope you meant it, because no turning back now.
confirm: Are you sure, you want to do this?
denied: I swear I didn't do it.
missing_aws_access_key: What is your AWS access key?
missing_aws_secret_key: Could you please tell me your AWS secret key? (don't forget to delete that message after you sent it)
missing_aws_region: What should I use as the default region?
